In fact, the laws, are working as planned and are simply delivering a core Australian principle – if you’re sick, you get medical care. pic.twitter.com/qSGJMfLEH6

Dear #manus #refugees, No matter what happens today please know that there are many Australians who care about you & place utmost importance on your well-being, health & safety. We're thinking of you & hoping for better days ahead. #auspol preserve #Medevac #haveaheart  #auspol
BREAKING: The Morrison government has secured the numbers to repeal refugee medical transfer rules and restore its border protection regime amid uproar in the Senate. http://ow.ly/VBO850xra7g
Oh Senator @JacquiLambie, what have you done? You (and your friends) will go down in Australian history as the people who denied sick refugees medical care. I hope that sits well with you.

The Parliament of Australia has voted this morning to repeal the Medevac legislation. And thereby they have put a nail in the coffins of who knows how many of our refugees languishing off-shore. But I suspect it may just have put a nail in the coffin of this horrible government.

BREAKING - a secret deal has been done between Jacqui Lambie and the Government to scrap Medevac and the vital emergency medical transfers of sick refugees to Australia.

This is utterly heartbreaking  pic.twitter.com/AXitLMcGRZ

A day after a New Zealand newspaper was criticised for its insensitive cartoon on the measles epidemic in Samoa, an Australian newspaper has published a cartoon criticising now repealed laws that allowed doctors to medically transfer refugees from offshore detention to Australia. pic.twitter.com/ioaqmzp2np

The Morrison Government’s inhumanity on stark display today. Leaving refugees locked up in PNG and Nauru, even when they are sick is barbaric and cruel. This is politics at its worst. Using innocent and fragile people lives as pawns. Not in my name.

Sad symmetry. 

Five years ago today, after weeks of waiting and obfuscating, Clive Palmer did a deal with the Abbott government to reintroduce punitive, cruel Temporary Protection Visas for refugees. pic.twitter.com/yuOv2sGqjV

Removing the tiniest bit of humanity - necessary medical care - from refugees who have been so cruelly stripped of hope, mental & physical health, & dignity in offshore detention under Australia's name is breathtakingly shameful.  https://womensagenda.com.au/latest/jacqui-lambie-sides-with-government-votes-against-medevac/ …
Gutted. Fucking disgusted with Lambie. These are HUMAN BEINGS and the least you could do is explain why you think we can withhold medical care. #SaveMedevac #refugees #CloseTheCamps
One day you’ll realise what you have done. I don’t know how you could possibly sleep at night. May the ghosts of dead refugees haunt you forever. pic.twitter.com/Y7aFmFWIoJ

these stats are from the federal parliamentary library. The overwhelming majority have been found by the United Nations, PNG's government, Nauru's government and the Australian government, to be genuine refugees pic.twitter.com/0Ewx6SDBzZ

the sheer fact is: our political class is actively making decisions to kill refugees, First Nations peoples, social security recipients, disabled ppl, the poor. and at this point it’s pitiful naivety or complacency to say otherwise
